reviews.text: We had also stayed at the Pudong Shangri La as in a previous review, but this Shangri La is real Chinese, not Western Chinese like the Pudong. It isnt fair to compare the 2. This has its own charm, and I too had to warm to it. On arrival I was a little unsure, but after looking around, and finding the room was incredibly spacious, clean and to a very good standard, I decided it was a really nice place to stay.
reviews.title: Charming Hotel

likes.liked: — The spacious rooms and overall charm of the place

reviews.text: The carpets were sumptious, the bed covers silk, the towels thick and pure white. The only bit I could complain about was the pool area, which needed updating, and the covered walkway between the 2 wings, which for some reason I didnt take to! Our room was in the East wing, and I wonder if those people who didnt have a nice room were in the West wing? We noticed work going on in the West wing - maybe updating it?
reviews.title: Wonderful hotel

reviews.text: Breakfast buffet was fine catering for all continents, and half the price of Hong Kong hotels.

reviews.text: It is beautifully situated opposite the West Lake but also experiences traffic noise if, as happened to us, your balcony door on your lake view does not fit properly. After an attempt to repair it, we were moved to a room on the side of the building. The Housekeeper went out of her way to ensure we were happy with the change of room contacting us later in the evening and appearing at check out to speak to us.

reviews.title: Past its prime
reviews.text: If you want a great view of West Lake then this is the place to be. Its in a quiet secluded section of the Lake has easy access to the canal. However, the hotel itself though is past its prime. We stayed on the Horizon Lounge and neither the lounge, food, or room were impressive as well. A major remodeling is due for this hotel to bring it up to the times.

We stayed at the west wing. Our room had a view of the West Lake. It was beautiful. The food in the resturant tastes very good. However, the location was located right in the West Lake. So, we had to take a taxi to tour around the city.
